    • run

      public void run()
      Description copied from class: World
      Run the game. On each iteration the gameloop does the following: - displays the player's map - processes the actions of every Actor in the game, regardless of map We could either only process the actors on the current map, which would make time stop on the other maps, or we could process all the actors. We chose to process all the actors.
      Overrides:
      run in class World

    • setTargetMoves
